feed.title: Yen-Lin Wu
feed.subtitle: An enthusiastic and amateur cyclist based in Taipei, Taiwan.

entry.title: Pilot
entry.content:
I have started my personal blog here in pursuit of keeping track of my workout habits.

A little about myself

I purchased my first gravel bike- Cannondale Topstone 2L in Alkmaar, The Netherlands in August 2022. It was a beautiful place to do cycling, only that it rains a little more often than I like in winter. I frequented the sand dunes nearby Alkmaar in the beginning, including Schoorlse duinen and Geestmerambacht.

In Feburary 2023, I decided to return to Taiwan after being away for alsmot 9 years. I started attending races and getting to know more about this country.

Photo below is my most recent race at Wuling, a 3275-meter high mountain peak in Nantou County.
entry.summary: I have started my personal blog here in pursuit of keeping track of my workout habits.
